TypeSignature.Value: public delegate void XmlNodeEventHandler(object sender, XmlNodeEventArgs e);
.class public auto ansi sealed XmlNodeEventHandler extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Sub XmlNodeEventHandler(sender As Object, e As XmlNodeEventArgs)
public delegate void XmlNodeEventHandler(System::Object ^ sender, XmlNodeEventArgs ^ e);
type XmlNodeEventHandler = delegate of obj * XmlNodeEventArgs -> unit

param.name: e
param.span: Objeto que contiene los datos del evento.

span.span: An that contains the event data.

summary.span: Representa el método que controlará el evento de un .

span.span: Represents the method that handles the event of an .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Cuando creas un delegado, identifica el método que controla el evento.When you create an delegate, you identify the method that handles the event. Para asociar el evento al controlador, se debe agregar una instancia del delegado al evento.To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event. Siempre que se produce el evento, se llama a su controlador, a menos que se quite el delegado.The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. Para obtener más información sobre los delegados de controlador de eventos, consulte [controlar y provocar eventos](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).For more information about event handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). El evento produce sólo cuando se llama a la método.The event occurs only when you call the method. ## Examples En el ejemplo siguiente se crea un , agrega un controlador de eventos para el eventos y deserializa un objeto.The following example creates an , adds an event handler for the event, and deserializes an object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlNodeEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventHandler Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlNodeEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlNodeEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlNodeEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
